TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RichTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.TextBoxBase

summary.span: 表示 Windows 多格式文本框控件。

span.span: Represents a Windows rich text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与控件，用户可以输入和编辑文本。With the control, the user can enter and edit text. 该控件还提供更高级的格式设置功能比标准控件。The control also provides more advanced formatting features than the standard control. 文本可以直接分配给该控件，也可以加载从丰富文本格式 (RTF) 或纯文本文件。Text can be assigned directly to the control, or can be loaded from a rich text format (RTF) or plain text file. 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配控件中的文本。The text within the control can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 控件提供大量可以使用控件中的文本的任何部分应用格式设置的属性。The control provides a number of properties you can use to apply formatting to any portion of text within the control. 若要更改的文本格式，它必须首先选择。To change the formatting of text, it must first be selected. 字符和段落格式设置，可以分配仅选定的文本。Only selected text can be assigned character and paragraph formatting. 一旦对文本的选定部分进行了设置，选择输入所选内容也格式化具有相同设置，直到设置更改后的所有文本或控件的文档的其他部分。Once a setting has been made to a selected section of text, all text entered after the selection is also formatted with the same settings until a setting change is made or a different section of the control's document is selected. 属性使您能够将粗体或斜体的文本。The property enables you to make text bold or italic. 你还可以使用此属性更改的大小和文本的字样。You can also use this property to change the size and typeface of the text. 属性使您能够更改的文本颜色。The property enables you to change the color of the text. 若要创建项目符号列表，可以使用属性。To create bulleted lists you can use the property. 你还可以调整段落格式设置通过设置， ，和属性。You can also adjust paragraph formatting by setting the , , and properties. 控件提供提供打开和保存文件的功能的方法。The control provides methods that provide functionality for opening and saving files. 方法使你能够加载到控件中的现有 RTF 或 ASCII 文本文件。The method enables you to load an existing RTF or ASCII text file into the control. 你也可以从已打开的数据流中加载数据。You can also load data from an already opened data stream. 使您能够将文件保存到 RTF 或 ASCII 文本。The enables you to save a file to RTF or ASCII text. 类似于方法，你还可以使用方法将保存到打开的数据流。Similar to the method, you can also use the method to save to an open data stream. 控件还提供了功能，用于查找的文本字符串。The control also provides features for finding strings of text. 方法是重载若要查找的文本这两个字符串以及为特定字符文本中的控件。The method is overloaded to find both strings of text as well as specific characters within the text of the control. 也可以初始化存储在内存中数据的控件。You can also initialize the control to data stored in memory. 例如，你可以初始化属性包含的文本显示，包括确定应如何格式化文本的格式为 RTF 代码的字符串。For example, you can initialize the property to a string that contains the text to display, including the RTF codes that determine how the text should be formatted. 如果控件中的文本包含链接，例如链接到网站，你可以使用适当地显示链接控件的文本中的属性。If the text within the control contains links, such as a link to a Web site, you can use the property to display the link appropriately in the control's text. 然后可处理事件以执行与链接相关联的任务。You can then handle the event to perform the tasks associated with the link. 属性使您能够从用户的操作保护控件中的文本。The property enables you to protect text within the control from manipulation by the user. 与受保护的文本控件中，你可以处理事件，以确定当用户已尝试修改受保护的文本，并提醒用户的文本受保护或用户提供一种标准的方式来操作受保护的文本。With protected text in your control, you can handle the event to determine when the user has attempted to modify protected text, and either alert the user that the text is protected or provide the user with a standard way to manipulate the protected text. 已使用的应用程序控件可以轻松地进行适配以便利用控件。Applications that already use controls can easily be adapted to make use of controls. 但是，控件不具有相同的 64k 字符容量限制的控件。However, the control does not have the same 64K character capacity limit of the control. 通常用于文本操作，并显示类似于 Microsoft Word 等文字处理应用程序的功能。The is typically used to provide text manipulation and display features similar to word processing applications such as Microsoft Word. > [!NOTE] > 方法并不适用于或事件。The method does not work with the or events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建将 RTF 文件加载到控件和"Text。 该单词的第一个实例的搜索控件The following code example creates a control that loads an RTF file into the control and searches for the first instance of the word "Text." 然后，代码更改字体样式、 字体大小和所选文本的字体颜色，并将所做的更改保存回原始文件。The code then changes the font style, font size, and font color of the selected text and saves the changes back to the original file. 示例代码可以通过添加到控件来完成其。The example code finishes by adding the control to its . 此示例需要创建的代码示例中的方法添加到类，并从窗体的构造函数。This example requires that the method created in the example code is added to a class and called from the constructor of the form. 该示例还需要创建一个 RTF 文件，包含单词"文本。"的 C 驱动器的根目录中The example also requires that an RTF file is created, in the root of the C drive, containing the word "Text." remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，控件中选择任何一部分文本选择整个单词。If this property is set to `true`, selecting any part of the text in the control selects the entire word. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建，文本将放大，自动选择控件的文本中单词的单词正在双击，并且控件的客户端区域右侧边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本将显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择而不考虑垂直显示的文本的单词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. summary.span: 获取或设置对文本应用项目符号样式时， 控件中使用的缩进。

span.span: The number of pixels inserted as the indentation after a bullet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将项目符号样式应用于一段文本，将设置属性`true`然后设置属性应缩进文本的像素数。To apply the bullet style to a paragraph of text, set the property to `true` and then set the property to the number of pixels that the text should be indented. 段落将具有应用于它与指定的符号后面的缩进量的项目符号样式。The paragraph will have the bullet style applied to it with the specified amount of indentation after the bullet. 此属性仅影响控件的文本和当前所选项目符号列表中的项目符号中的当前段落。This property only affects the current paragraph within the control's text and the currently selected bullet in a list of bulleted items. 若要将不同的缩进级别应用于整个项目符号列表项的列表中，所有项目符号列表项的文本之前，必须选择设置属性。To apply a different indentation level to an entire list of bulleted items, all the text of the bulleted items must be selected before setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性， ， ，和属性以创建中的项目符号列表控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例需要控件名为`richTextBox1`在窗体上创建。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法确定是否剪贴板的当前内容中指定的剪贴板数据格式在启用使用者粘贴到的信息之前控件。You can use this method to determine whether the current contents of the Clipboard are in a specified Clipboard data format before enabling the user to paste the information into the control. 例如，可以创建的事件处理程序粘贴命令事件并使用此方法来确定是否粘贴基于剪贴板中的数据类型，应启用。For example, you could create an event handler for a event of a paste command and use this method to determine whether the paste should be enabled based on the type of data in the Clipboard. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以粘贴到位图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 在从文件中打开一个位图之后, 该示例使用方法以将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，该示例将检索的格式对象，使用方法以验证格式可以粘贴到控件，然后使用粘贴数据的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, uses the method to verify that the format can be pasted into the control, and then uses the method to paste the data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，文本框由控件中输入任何文本要 URL 自动设置为链接的格式。If this property is set to `true`, any text entered into the control that is determined by the to be a URL is automatically formatted as a link. 你可以创建的事件处理程序事件来处理所有链接在单击控件中。You can create an event handler for the event to handle all links clicked in the control. 到事件处理程序提供事件提供数据，可用于确定要处理的链接控件中被单击的链接。The that is provided to the event handler for the event provides data that enables you to determine which link was clicked in the control in order to process the link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含的事件处理程序事件。The following code example contains an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序处理的文档中的链接单击控制，并启动默认浏览器的实例 (使用方法)，显示被单击的链接的页。The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked. 此示例需要事件处理程序已连接到事件。This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the event for a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此版本的方法搜索中指定的字符的列表中的一个字符的第一个实例`characterSet`参数并返回字符的位置。This version of the method searches for the first instance of a character from a list of characters specified in the `characterSet` parameter and returns the location of the character. 例如，你将传递字符，其中包含的字符 Q 的数组。For example, you pass an array of characters containing the character 'Q'. 如果控件包含文本"快速 Brown Fox"，方法将返回四个值。If the control contained the text "The Quick Brown Fox", the method would return the value of four. 大写字符和小写字符被视为在搜索中的不同值。An upper case character and a lower case character are considered different values in the search. 如果属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的字符。If the property returns a negative value, the characters being searched for were not found within the contents of the control. 此方法可用于搜索的一组控件内的字符。You can use this method to search for a group of characters within the control. 此版本的方法要求在控件中包含的整个文档会搜索的字符。This version of the method requires that the entire document contained in the control is searched for the characters. 如果从提供的方法中的字符列表的字符`characterSet`找到的参数，此方法返回的值是在控件中的字符的位置的从零开始索引。If a character from the character list provided in the method's `characterSet` parameter is found, the value returned by this method is a zero-based index of the character's position in the control. 空间时应考虑字符由方法确定一个字符的位置。A space is considered a character by the method when determining the location of a character. ## Examples 下面的代码示例的内容中搜索传递给方法中的字符有关`text`参数。The following code example searches the contents of a for the characters that are passed to the method in the `text` parameter. 如果内容`text`数组位于，该方法返回找到; 否则为值的索引，则返回-1。If the contents of the `text` array are found in the , the method returns the index of the value that is found; otherwise, it returns -1. 该示例需要此方法所在的类中包含控件名为`richTextBox1`和控件，名为`button1`，即连接到`Click`中定义的事件处理程序该示例。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a control named `richTextBox1` and a control, named `button1`, that is connected to the `Click` event handler defined in the example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法搜索中指定的文本`str`参数并返回在控件内的字符串的搜索的第一个字符的位置。The method searches for the text specified in the `str` parameter and returns the location of the first character of the search string within the control. 如果该属性返回一个负值，该控件的内容中未找到要搜索的文本字符串。If the property returns a negative value, the text string being searched for was not found within the contents of the control. 此方法可用于创建可以提供给控件的用户的搜索功能。You can use this method to create search functionality that can be provided to the user of the control. 此方法还可用于搜索文本，以替换为特定的格式。You can also use this method to search for text to be replaced with a specific format. 例如，如果用户文本框控件中输入日期，则无法使用方法来搜索文档中的所有日期和在使用之前将它们替换为适当的格式的控件的方法。For example, if the user entered dates into the control, you could use the method to search for all dates in the document and replace them with the appropriate format before using the method of the control. 与此版本的方法，你可以指定选项，使你可以展开或缩小搜索范围。With this version of the method, you can specify options that enable you to expand or narrow your search. 你可以指定允许你以匹配的大小写的搜索词或完整的字词，而不是部分单词搜索选项。You can specify options that enable you to match the casing of the search word or to search for entire words instead of partial words. 通过指定`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中的枚举`options`参数，你可以搜索文本从文档底部到顶部，而不是默认顶部到底部搜索方法。By specifying the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` enumeration in the `options` parameter, you can search for text from the bottom of the document to the top instead of the default top to bottom search method. 此版本的方法还使您缩小搜索的文本范围的选择控件的文本内的特定起始位置。This version of the method also enables you to narrow the search for text by selecting a specific starting position within the control's text. 此功能可以启用你可以避免的文本，可能已搜索完或您要搜索的特定文本知道不存在。This feature can enable you to avoid text that might have already been searched or where the specific text you are searching for is known not to exist. 当`RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse`中指定值`options`参数、 的值`start`参数指示由于时使用此版本的搜索将从文档底部开始反向搜索将结束位置的位置方法。When the `RichTextBoxFinds.Reverse` value is specified in the `options` parameter, the value of the `start` parameter indicates the position where the reverse search will end since the search will start at the bottom of the document when using this version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 方法，其接受`string`如参数找不到多个行中的文本包含的文本。The methods that accept a `string` as a parameter cannot find text that is contained on more than one line of text within the . 执行此类的搜索将返回值为负一 (-1)。Performing such a search will return a value of negative one (-1). ## Examples 下面的代码示例的整个内容中搜索搜索字符串的第一个实例传递给方法的文本参数。The following code example searches the entire contents of a for the first instance of a search string passed into the text parameter of the method. 搜索起始位置由该方法的 start 参数指定。The search starting location is specified by the start parameter of the method. 如果在中找到的搜索字符串，该方法返回找到的文本的第一个字符的索引位置，并突出显示找到的文本; 否则，它将返回值-1。If the search string is found in the , the method returns the index location of the first character of the found text and highlights the found text; otherwise, it returns a value of -1. 该示例还指定在搜索匹配指定的搜索字符串的大小写的选项。The example also specifies options in the search to match the case of the specified search string. 该示例需要此方法所在的类中包含名为`richTextBox1`。The example requires that this method is placed in the class of a that contains a named `richTextBox1`. 你可以使用此示例执行"查找下一个"类型的操作。You can use this example to perform a "Find Next" type of operation. 一旦已找到搜索文本的实例，你可以通过更改的值中查找文本的其他实例`start`参数来搜索超出当前匹配项的位置的位置。Once an instance of the search text has been found, you can find other instances of the text by changing the value of the `start` parameter to search at a location beyond the position of the current match. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格中的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放将鼠标坐标传递给此方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在该控件的文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法替换方法搜索特定字符串在控件，并显示找到的字符串所在的位置中的字符索引控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method with the method to search for a specific string within a control and display the character index where the found string is located within the control. 示例搜索单词"brown"控件的内容中，并返回找到的搜索字符串的字符索引位置。The example searches for the word "brown" within the contents of the control and returns the character index position where the search string is found. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`richTextBox1`包含文本。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1` that contains text. 它还要求该示例中的代码已连接到事件。It also requires that the code in the example is connected to the event of the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`的方法参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一个逻辑行中的文本的一部分控件换行到下一行，方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符已经换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一行，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法来搜索的文本，你可以获取到找到搜索结果的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 你可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法，以确定其行单词。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. 在某些情况下，不会引发异常时`index`参数是无效值。In certain cases, does not throw an exception when the `index` parameter is an invalid value. 例如:For example: - 如果`index`参数是或-1，返回 0。If the `index` parameter is or -1, returns 0. - 如果`index`参数是文本长度或，返回的最后一行文本，并不一定相同数作为`Lines.Length-1`，具体的值取决于属性。If the `index` parameter is the text length or , returns the number of the last line of text, which is not necessarily the same as `Lines.Length-1`, depending on the value of the property. 在这些情况下，验证之前调用的输入。In these cases, validate the input before calling . > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数为超出可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在窗体包含控件名为`RichTextBox1`，名为的按钮`Button1`和名为的两个文本框`TextBox1`和`TextBox2`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control named `RichTextBox1`, a button named `Button1` and two text boxes named `TextBox1` and `TextBox2`. 当运行示例时，输入中的搜索字符串`TextBox2`单击该按钮以获取搜索结果。When the example is running, enter a search string in `TextBox2` and click the button to get search results. summary.span: 当用户在控件文本内的链接上单击时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user clicks on a link within the text of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建的事件处理程序处理已单击控件内的链接此事件。You can create an event handler for this event to process a link that has been clicked within the control. 使用提供给事件处理程序的信息，你可以确定文档中被单击的链接。Using the information provided to the event handler, you can determine which link was clicked in the document. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，显示为文本与不是可单击的链接。By default, links are displayed as text and are not clickable. 要使它们可单击组属性`true`。To make them clickable set the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含的事件处理程序事件。The following code example contains an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序处理的文档中的链接单击控制，并启动默认浏览器的实例 (使用方法)，显示被单击的链接的页。The event handler processes link clicks within the document of a control and launches an instance of the default browser (using the method), displaying the page for the link that was clicked. 此示例需要事件处理程序已连接到事件。This example requires that the event handler has been connected to the event for a . summary.span: 将 RTF 格式文件或标准 ASCII 文本文件加载到 控件中。

span.span: Loads a rich text format (RTF) or standard ASCII text file into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载的文件时方法，所加载的文件的内容替换的全部内容控件。When loading a file with the method, the contents of the file being loaded replace the entire contents of the control. 这将导致的值和属性来更改。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 此方法可用于将以前创建的文本或 RTF 文档加载到操作的控件。You can use this method to load a previously created text or RTF document into the control for manipulation. 如果你想要保存该文件，则可以使用方法。If you want to save the file, you can use the method. > [!NOTE] > 与此版本的方法，如果正在加载该文件不是一个 RTF 文档中，将发生异常。With this version of the method, if the file being loaded is not an RTF document, an exception will occur. 若要加载不同类型的文件，如 ASCII 文本文件，请使用此方法接受从值的其他版本枚举作为参数。To load a different type of file such as an ASCII text file, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. > [!NOTE] > 方法将不会打开一个文件，直到为创建句柄。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 确保控件的句柄创建，然后再调方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打开到 RTF 文件控件。The following code example opens an RTF file into the control. 该示例使用类以显示对话框以请求用户文件。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the file from the user. 代码接着加载此文件假定它是 RTF 文档文件。The code then loads that file assuming that it is an RTF document file. 如果文件不是，该示例代码将引发异常。If the file is not, the example code will throw an exception. 此示例需要将代码置于中具有类控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.LoadFile Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此版本的方法以加载数据的现有流中的数据。You can use this version of the method to load the with data from an existing stream of data. 加载到控件的数据的整个内容替换控件。The data that is loaded into the control replaces the entire contents of the control. 这将导致的值和属性来更改。This will cause the values of the and properties to change. 此方法可用于已打开的文件加载到数据流到操作的控件。You can use this method to load a file that has been previously opened into a data stream into the control for manipulation. 如果你想要将控件内容保存到流中，你可以使用方法接受对象作为参数。If you want to save contents of the control back into the stream, you can use the method that accepts a object as a parameter. 此版本的方法还使您可以指定要加载到控件的数据的类型。This version of the method also enables you to specify the type of data that is being loaded into the control. 此功能，可使用到控件包含丰富文本格式 (RTF) 的文档以外的数据的数据流。This feature enables you to use data streams that contain data other than rich text format (RTF) documents into the control. > [!NOTE] > 方法将不会打开一个文件，直到为创建句柄。The method will not open a file until a handle is created for the . 确保控件的句柄创建，然后再调方法。Ensure that the control's handle is created before calling the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和与流的方法。The following code example demonstrates using the and methods with streams. 它还演示如何使用， ， ，和成员。It also demonstrates using the , , , and members. 这是已准备好运行时将其复制到你的项目的完整示例。This is a complete example that is ready to run when you copy it to your project. summary.span: 获取或设置用户可在多格式文本框控件中键入或粘贴的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the rich text box control.

value.span: 可以在文本框控件中输入的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为 0 时，则可以在控件中输入的最大长度是文本的 64 KB 的字符。When this property is set to 0, the maximum length of the text that can be entered in the control is 64 KB of characters. 此属性通常是时使用用于显示单个丰富文本格式 (RTF) 文本行。This property is typically used when the is used to display a single line of rich text format (RTF) text. 可以使用此属性，以限制为如邮政编码和电话号码的值输入控件中的文本的长度或将输入数据时要输入在数据库中的文本的长度限制。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 你可以限制到数据库中的对应字段的最大长度文本框控件中输入的文本。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，你可以设置的值属性的长度大于指定的值的值属性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性仅影响在运行时文本框控件中输入的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定如果文本分配给控件大于分配给值属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine if text being assigned to a control is larger than the value assigned to the property. 如果文本不是更大的该示例使用要分配给控件的文本属性。If the text is not larger, the example uses the property to assign the text to the control. 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体和示例中的方法调用与提供给粘贴到该控件的参数的文本。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to a form and that the method in the example is called with text supplied to the parameter that is to be pasted into the control. 该示例还要求属性已设置为值为限制到文本输入。The example also requires that the property has been set to a value to limit text entry into the . [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.MaxLength#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.MaxLength/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Pastes the contents of the Clipboard in the specified Clipboard format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于将数据从剪贴板粘贴到控件。You can use this method to paste data from the clipboard into the control. 此版本的方法是不同于作为它的方法使你能够将只会将文本粘贴指定的剪贴板格式。This version of the method is different from the method as it enables you to paste only text in a specified Clipboard format. 你可以使用方法来确定在剪贴板中的数据是否为指定的剪贴板格式。You can use the method to determine whether the data within the Clipboard is in the specified Clipboard format. 然后，你可以调用此版本的方法，以确保进行与相应的数据格式，必须粘贴操作。You can then call this version of the method to ensure that the paste operation is made with the appropriate data format. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以粘贴到位图控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to paste a bitmap into the control. 在从文件中打开一个位图之后, 该示例使用方法以将位图复制到 Windows 剪贴板。After opening a bitmap from file, the example uses the method to copy the bitmap to the Windows clipboard. 最后，该示例将检索的格式对象，请验证格式可以粘贴到控件，并使用粘贴数据的方法。Finally, the example retrieves the format for the object, verifies that the format can be pasted into the control, and uses the method to paste the data. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Protected As EventHandler

summary.span: 当用户尝试修改控件中受保护的文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user attempts to modify protected text in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在应用程序来确定当用户已尝试修改已标记为控件中受保护的文本时，可以创建的事件处理程序此事件。You can create an event handler for this event in your applications to determine when the user has attempted to modify text that has been marked as protected in the control. 可以使用事件处理程序，以通知受保护的文本用户正尝试修改的用户，或以显示一个对话框，使用户能够对文本进行相应更改。The event handler can be used to notify the user that the text the user is attempting to modify is protected or to display a dialog box that enables the user to make appropriate changes to the text. 例如，如果受保护的区域是日期，则可以显示一个对话框，使用户能够选择然后可以应用于控件的文本的日期。For example, if the protected area is a date, you can display a dialog box that enables the user to choose a date which can then be applied to the text of the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 重新应用控件中上次撤消的操作。

span.span: Reapplies the last operation that was undone in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 然后，可以使用方法以重新应用到控件的上一个撤消操作。You can then use the method to reapply the last undo operation to the control. 方法使您能够确定是否可以重新撤消了用户的上一个操作应用于控件。The method enables you to determine whether the last operation the user has undone can be reapplied to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和属性，与方法，以限制对除删除文本的任何操作的重做操作。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and properties, and the method, to restrict a redo operation to any action except the deletion of text. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控制的和中的某个操作已经执行并通过撤消在此示例中的代码调用之前。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control and that an operation within the has been performed and undone before the code in this example is called. summary.span: 获取或设置 控件内单个文本行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the size of a single line of text within the control.

value.span: 控件中单个文本行的大小（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The size, in pixels, of a single line of text in the control.

value.span: 默认值为零。

span.span: The default is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当文本框控件中输入一个大于零的值时，则不可见的边距置于控件在指定的控件左侧的像素数。When a value greater than zero is entered into the control, a nonvisible margin is placed in the control at the specified number of pixels from the left side of the control. 输入超出此边距的任何文本将放置在控件中的文本的下一行。Any text that is entered that extends beyond this margin is placed on the next line of text in the control. 此属性会影响当前输入到控件，以及设置该属性后文本框控件中输入任何其他文本的所有文本。This property affects all text currently entered into the control as well as any additional text entered into the control after the property is set. 你可以使用此属性指定的所有文本输入到最大线条宽度控件。You can use this property to specify a maximum line width for all text entered into a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建，文本将放大，自动选择控件的文本中单词的单词正在双击，并且控件的客户端区域右侧边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本将显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择而不考虑垂直显示的文本的单词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: RTF 格式的控件文本。

span.span: The text of the control in RTF format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性设置为将 RTF 格式化文本到控件，以进行显示或带指定 RTF 格式定义控件的文本中提取该控件的文本。You can use this property to place RTF formatted text into the control for display or to extract the text of the control with the specified RTF formatting defined in the text of the control. 将另一个 RTF 源，如 Microsoft Word 或 Windows 写字板的 RTF 文本分配给该控件时，通常使用此属性。This property is typically used when you are assigning RTF text from another RTF source, such as Microsoft Word or Windows WordPad, to the control. 如果你更改保留在运行时，仅原始文本不带格式的属性。If you change the property at run time, only raw text without formatting is preserved. RTF 代码，请参阅"丰富文本格式 (RTF) 规范，版本 1.6"MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。For the RTF codes, see "rich text format (RTF) Specification, version 1.6" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

summary.span: 将 的内容保存到 RTF 格式文件。

span.span: Saves the contents of the to a rich text format (RTF) file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够将控件的整个内容保存到可由其他程序，如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板 RTF 文件。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果文件名传递给`path`上指定的目录已存在参数，则文件将覆盖恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 你可以使用方法以加载到文件的内容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . > [!NOTE] > 若要将控件的内容保存到不同类型的文件格式，如 ASCII 文本中，使用此方法接受从值的其他版本枚举作为参数。To save the contents of the control to a different type of file format such as ASCII text, use the other versions of this method that accept a value from the enumeration as a parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将保存的内容RTF 文件的控件。The following code example saves the contents of a control to an RTF file. 该示例使用类来显示一个对话框以请求来自用户、 路径和文件的文件名保存。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request from the user, the path and filename of the file to save. 然后，此代码将保存假定内容为丰富文本格式的文件。The code then saves the file assuming the content is in rich text format. 如果该文件已存在，则以无自动覆盖。If the file already exists, it is automatically overwritten. 此示例需要将代码置于中具有类控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使你能够将控件的整个内容保存到可由其他程序，如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板 RTF 文件。The method enables you to save the entire contents of the control to an RTF file that can be used by other programs such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 如果文件名传递给`path`上指定的目录已存在参数，则文件将覆盖恕不另行通知。If the file name that is passed to the `path` parameter already exists at the specified directory, the file will be overwritten without notice. 你可以使用方法以加载到文件的内容。You can use the method to load the contents of a file into the . 此版本的方法，可指定要保存到控件的内容的文件类型。This version of the method enables you to specify a file type to save the contents of the control to. 此功能可用于确保该文件保存在基于控件的内容的正确格式。You can use this feature to ensure that the file is saved in the proper format based on the contents of the control. 例如，如果你的文档在字体样式或着色上的没有差别，可以保存该文件为 ASCII 文本文件通过设置`fileType`参数`RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`。For example, if your document has no differences in font style or coloring, you can save the file as an ASCII text file by setting the `fileType` parameter to `RichTextBoxStreamType.PlainText`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将保存的内容成一个 ASCII 文本文件。The following code example saves the contents of the into an ASCII text file. 该示例使用类以显示对话框以请求用户的路径和文件名称。The example uses the class to display a dialog to request the path and file name from the user. 然后，代码将控件的内容保存到该文件。The code then saves the contents of the control to that file. 该示例使用此版本的方法，以指定将文件保存为而不是标准的丰富文本格式的 ASCII 文本文件。The example uses this version of the method to specify that the file be saved as an ASCII text file instead of the standard rich text format. 此示例需要将代码置于中具有类控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the code is placed in a class that has a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic RichTextBox.SaveFile1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性使您能够提供给的用户，水平和垂直滚动条控件，使控件的物理维度之外的控件中的滚动文本。This property enables you to provide horizontal and vertical scroll bars to the user of the control to enable scrolling text within the control that is outside of the physical dimensions of the control. 此属性还可用于移除要限制滚动控件内容的控件的滚动条。You can also use this property to remove scroll bars from the control to restrict scrolling the contents of the control. > [!NOTE] > 不会显示水平滚动条如果是`true`，而不考虑的值的属性。Horizontal scroll bars will not be shown if the is `true`, regardless of the value of the property.

span.span: Gets or sets the currently selected rich text format (RTF) formatted text in the control.

value.span: 控件中选定的 RTF 文本。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可获取该控件，包括 RTF 格式设置代码中选定的文本。This property enables you to obtain the selected text in the control, including the RTF formatting codes. 你可以使用此属性将文本复制从控件，完成，但包含格式设置，和粘贴其他的应用程序接受 RTF 文本格式的文本，例如 Microsoft Word 和 Windows 写字板。You can use this property to copy text from your control, complete with formatting, and paste the text in other applications that accept RTF formatted text, such as Microsoft Word and Windows WordPad. 若要获取所选的文本，而无需 RTF 格式设置代码，请使用属性。To get the selected text, without RTF formatting codes, use the property. 如果当前未不选定任何文本，此属性中指定的文本将插入的插入点处。If no text is currently selected, the text specified in this property is inserted at the insertion point. 如果已选定文本，分配给此属性的任何文本将替换所选的文本。If text is selected, any text assigned to this property replaces the selected text.

summary.span: 获取或设置应用到当前选定内容或插入点的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment to apply to the current selection or insertion point.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何段落，则设置此属性适用于插入点出现以及有关段落对齐方式属性设置的段落之后创建的段落对齐方式设置。If no paragraph is selected in the control, setting this property applies the alignment setting to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears as well as to paragraphs created after the paragraph that has the alignment property setting. 例如，如果有两个段落中的控制和插入点位于第二个段落中。For example, if there are two paragraphs in a control and the insertion point is located within the second paragraph. 如果你设置属性`HorizontalAlignment.Center`，将在控件内居中的插入点处的段落。If you set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`, the paragraph at the insertion point will be centered within the control. 如果第三个段落创建后的第二个段落中，它也是的中心对齐的控件。If a third paragraph is created after the second paragraph, it also is aligned to the center of the control. 如果属性设置时，将在控件内做出选择，则所有选定段落对齐根据此属性设置。If a selection is made within the control when the property is set, all paragraphs selected are aligned based on this property setting. 你可以使用此属性来对齐在中创建的文档中的段落。You can use this property to align the paragraphs in a document being created in the . 例如，如果你想要居中的文档中的所有段落，你可以选择控件中所有段落和集属性`HorizontalAlignment.Center`。For example, if you want all paragraphs in a document to be centered, you can select all the paragraphs in the control and set the property to `HorizontalAlignment.Center`. > [!NOTE] > 返回`SelectionAlignment.Left`文本选择时包含采用混合对齐方式的多个段落。 returns `SelectionAlignment.Left` when the text selection contains multiple paragraphs with mixed alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将中的文本对齐。The following code example demonstrates how to align text within the . 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionAlignment/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示项目符号样式是否应用到当前选定内容或插入点。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bullet style is applied to the current selection or insertion point.

value.span: 如果当前选定内容或插入点应用了项目符号样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current selection or insertion point has the bullet style applied; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不选择任何文本，则项目符号样式应用到当前插入点，并对所有用户输入后插入点的段落。If no text is selected, the bullet style is applied to the current insertion point and to all paragraphs that the user enters after the insertion point. 项目符号样式应用于控件的文本插入点移动为止，或当用户按 Enter 键下的空项目符号项上。The bullet style is applied to the text of the control until the insertion point is moved or when the user presses the Enter key on an empty bullet item. 如果此属性设置时，将控件中选定文本，将选定文本中的所有段落都转换为项目符号列表中的项目符号列表项。If text is selected within the control when this property is set, all paragraphs within the selected text are converted into bulleted items in the bulleted list. 你可以使用此属性来创建在中创建的文档中的项目符号列表控件。You can use this property to create bulleted lists within the documents you create in the control. 属性使您能够指定要应用的项目符号和项目符号列表项的文本之间的缩进量。The property enables you to specify the amount of indentation to apply between the bullet and the bulleted item's text. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用具有属性， ，和属性以创建中的项目符号列表控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property with the , , and properties to create a bulleted list in a control. 此示例需要控件名为`richTextBox1`在窗体上创建。This example requires that a control named `richTextBox1` is created on a form. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectionChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 控件内的选定文本更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the selection of text within the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以创建的事件处理程序来确定当用户已更改控件中的文本选择时此事件。You can create an event handler for this event to determine when the user has changed text selection within the control. 此事件的事件处理程序可以用于保持用户已完成应用程序中的任务之前选择的文本。An event handler for this event can be used to keep text selected until the user has completed a task within the application. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`RichTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `RichTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#544](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#544)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#544](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#544)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionCharOffset { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置控件中的文本是显示在基线上、作为上标还是作为基线下方的下标。

span.span: Gets or sets whether text in the control appears on the baseline, as a superscript, or as a subscript below the baseline.

value.span: 指定字符偏移量的数字。

span.span: A number that specifies the character offset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须介于-2000年到 2000年之间。The value of this property must be between -2000 and 2000. 如果此属性设置为零，则将显示文本位于基线上。If this property is set to zero, the text appears on the baseline. 如果它是正数值中的数字指定用来引发文本选择基线上的像素数。If it is a positive number, the number specifies the number of pixels by which to raise the text selection above the baseline. 如果它为负数，此数字指定依据具有到下标文本选择的像素数。If it is a negative number, this number specifies the number of pixels by which to subscript the text selection. 可以使用此属性指定为上标或下标的文本。You can use this property to specify text as superscript or subscript. 如果未选择文本，偏移量被应用到当前插入点，并为用户键入插入点之后的所有文本。If no text is selected, the offset is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that the user types after the insertion point. 属性更改为不同的值，或直到将插入点移动到在控件内的其他部分之前，将应用的字符偏移量。The character offset applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和任何文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 此属性可用于创建此类应用程序作为数学表达式上标和下标的文本。You can use this property to create superscript and subscript text for such applications as mathematical expressions. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定上标和下标的文本中使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify superscript and subscript text within the using the property. 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.SelectionCharOffset/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置当前选定文本或插入点的文本颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the text color of the current text selection or insertion point.

value.span: 表示应用到当前选定文本或在插入点后输入的文本的颜色的 。

span.span: A that represents the color to apply to the current text selection or to text entered after the insertion point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前选定的文本将具有多个指定的颜色，此属性返回`Color.Empty`。If the current text selection has more than one color specified, this property returns `Color.Empty`. 如果当前未不选定任何文本，则会将此属性中指定的文本颜色应用到当前插入点和插入点之后键入到控件的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the text color specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 属性更改为不同的颜色，或直到将插入点移动到在控件内的其他部分之前，将应用的文本颜色设置。The text color setting applies until the property is changed to a different color or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和任何文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 你可以使用此属性来更改中文本的颜色。You can use this property to change the color of text in the . 若要使文本加粗控件中，使用要分配的新字体有指定的粗体的字体样式属性。To make text bold in the control, use the property to assign a new font that has the bold font style specified. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示用户指定的当前文本选择或输入在当前插入后的文本的颜色点中控件。The following code example displays a to the user to specify a color for the current text selection or text entered after the current insertion point in a control. 此示例需要在示例中定义的方法添加到类，该类包含控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that the method defined in the example is added to a class that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. span.span: Gets or sets the font of the current text selection or insertion point.

span.span: A that represents the font to apply to the current text selection or to text entered after the insertion point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前选定的文本具有多个指定的字体，此属性是`null`。If the current text selection has more than one font specified, this property is `null`. 如果当前未不选定任何文本，则会将此属性中指定的字体应用到当前插入点和插入点之后键入到控件的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the font specified in this property is applied to the current insertion point and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 属性更改为不同的字体或直到将插入点移动到在控件内的其他部分之前，将应用字体设置。The font setting applies until the property is changed to a different font or until the insertion point is moved to a different section within the control. 如果控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和任何文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 你可以使用此属性来更改中的文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the font style of text in the . 你可以将文本控件中的粗体、 斜体和带下划线。You can make the text in the control bold, italic, and underlined. 你还可以更改的文本以及应用于文本的字体的大小。You can also change the size of the text and the font applied to the text. 若要更改控件中的文本的颜色，请使用属性。To change the color of the text in the control, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例更改当前设置的文本选择或输入中的插入点之后的文本的字体以粗体显示样式控件。The following code example changes the current font bold style setting for the text selection or text entered after the insertion point within the control. 此示例需要在方法中包含的代码。This example requires that the code is contained within a method in a . 该示例还要求命名`richTextBox1`，已添加到。The example also requires that a , named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the . summary.span: 获取或设置选定段落中第一行文本的左边缘和同一段落中后面各行的左边缘之间的距离。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果当前未不选定任何文本，悬挂缩进将应用到在其中插入点出现的段落和插入点之后键入到控件的所有文本。If no text is currently selected, the hanging indent is applied to the paragraph in which the insertion point appears and to all text that is typed into the control after the insertion point. 悬挂缩进设置适用，直到属性更改为不同的值或插入点移动到在控件内的其他段落为止。The hanging indent setting applies until the property is changed to a different value or until the insertion point is moved to a different paragraph within the control. 如果控件中选定文本，文本选择将具有对其应用此属性的值后，输入所选的文本和任何文本。If text is selected within the control, the selected text and any text entered after the text selection will have the value of this property applied to it. 此属性可用于将悬挂缩进应用于你段落。You can use this property to apply a hanging indent to your paragraphs. 若要设置的段落选择内容的第一行的缩进，使用属性。To set the indention of the first line of a paragraph selection, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定悬挂缩进内的使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to specify hanging indents within the using the property. 此示例需要控件，名为`richTextBox1`，已添加到窗体。This example requires that a control, named `richTextBox1`, has been added to the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性，使用户能够轻松地选择中的文本行。You can use this property to enable the user to easily select lines of text in the . 选定内容的边距添加到左侧。The selection margin is added to the left side of the . 此边距便于用户选择控件左侧开始的文本。This margin makes it easier for the user to select text starting on the left side of the control. 用户可以在选定内容的边距选择单个文本行中单击或双击以选择被双击的行包含在整个段落。The user can click in the selection margin to select a single line of text or double-click to select the entire paragraph that the line double-clicked is contained within. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`true`，则设置属性`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both`不会导致要显示的滚动条。If the property is set to `true`, setting the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Horizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Vertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.Both` will not cause scroll bars to be displayed. 为了显示时的滚动条属性设置为`true`，将其设置属性`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`， `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`，或`RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`。In order to display scroll bars while the property is set to `true`, set the property to `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedHorizontal`, `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedVertical`, or `RichTextBoxScrollBars.ForcedBoth`.

summary.span: 获取或设置 的当前缩放级别。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值可介于 1/64 (0.015625) 和 64.0，不含之间。The value of this property can be between 1/64 (0.015625) and 64.0, not inclusive. 值为 1.0 指示无缩放应用于控件。A value of 1.0 indicates that no zoom is applied to the control. 当该文档包含 TrueType 字体时，缩放功能以最佳方式执行。The zoom feature performs optimally when the document contains TrueType fonts. 不是 TrueType 字体使用的控件，文档中时属性将使用最接近的整数值。When a font that is not TrueType is used within the document of the control, the property will use the nearest whole number value. 你可以使用此属性启用的用户控件缩放到太小，若要查看或紧缩视图以启用多个要在屏幕上查看的文档部分中的说明。You can use this property to enable the user of the control to zoom into sections of the documentation that are too small to view or to condense the view to enable more of the document to be viewed on screen. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建，文本将放大，自动选择控件的文本中单词的单词正在双击，并且控件的客户端区域右侧边距时。The following code example demonstrates how to create a that zooms in on text, automatically selects words in the text of the control when a word is double-clicked, and has a margin on the right side of the client area of the control. 如果控件具有较小的宽度，使用此代码将创建其中每个字符的文本将显示在其对应行。If the control has a small width, using this code will create a where each character of text is displayed on its own line. 在此垂直显示位置上，单击某个词的任何部分将选择而不考虑垂直显示的文本的单词的所有字符。While in this vertical display position, clicking on any part of a word will select all characters of the word regardless of the fact that the text is displayed vertically. 此示例要求你拥有一个包含窗体控件名为`richTextBox1`。This example requires that you have a form that contains a control named `richTextBox1`. [!code-cpp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RichTextBox.ZoomFactor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/RichTextBox.ZoomFactor/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 指定的缩放因子不在允许的范围内。
